# Dialogue

> Event-based realtime communication library built on Socket.IO, Hono, and Bun

## Guide

- [Getting Started](/guide/start/getting-started.md): Installation, basic setup, and your first real-time application using Dialogue
- [Chat Application](/guide/examples/chat-application.md): A basic chat application with messages, typing indicators, and user presence
- [Live Notifications](/guide/examples/live-notifications.md): A notification system that delivers real-time alerts to users
- [Live Dashboard](/guide/examples/live-dashboard.md): A real-time dashboard showing live metrics and updates
- [Multiplayer Game](/guide/examples/multiplayer-game.md): A simple multiplayer game with player positions and game state
- [IoT Monitoring](/guide/examples/iot-monitoring.md): Real-time monitoring of IoT devices with sensor data
- [Collaborative Editing](/guide/examples/collaborative-editing.md): Real-time collaborative editing with cursor positions and document changes
- [Event Persistence](/guide/examples/event-persistence.md): A chat application with persistent history using SQLite/PostgreSQL and the onCleanup/onLoad hooks
- [Configuration Guide](/guide/api/configuration/index.md): All configuration options for Dialogue, including event definitions, room configurations, and server settings
- [Event Definitions](/guide/api/configuration/events.md): Define events with schema validation using Zod
- [Room Configuration](/guide/api/configuration/rooms.md): Configure rooms, capacity limits, and default subscriptions
- [Dialogue Configuration](/guide/api/configuration/dialogue-config.md): Main server configuration, CORS, and options
- [Lifecycle Hooks](/guide/api/configuration/hooks.md): Client, room, socket, and event lifecycle hooks
- [Authentication](/guide/api/configuration/authentication.md): Client authentication and JWT setup
- [TypeScript Types](/guide/api/configuration/types.md): Type definitions and interfaces
- [Backend API Reference](/guide/api/backend-api.md): Complete backend API for Dialogue, including the Dialogue instance, rooms, and connected clients
- [Client API Reference](/guide/api/client-api.md): Client SDK for connecting to a Dialogue server from frontend applications
- [Architecture](/guide/others/architecture.md): Internal architecture, design decisions, and component interactions of Dialogue
- [LLMs](/guide/others/llms-txt.md): View LLMs.txt
- [LLMs Full](/guide/others/llms-full-txt.md): View LLMs Full
